mapper.select: select idx, detail, regiDate, complDate, challStatus, failStatus from todolist where failStatus = 0 and id = #{id} and challStatus = #{challStatus} order by idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into todolist (id, detail, regidate, COMPLDATE, failStatus, challStatus) values (#{id}, #{detail}, now(), #{complDate}, 0, #{challStatus})
mapper.update: update todolist set detail = #{detail}, complDate = #{complDate} where id = #{id} and idx = #{idx}
